doubleDown.title: Double Down
description: Players can double their bet and draw exactly one additional card.

splitOptions.title: Allow for Split
description: If the player’s first two cards are of the same value, they can split them into two separate hands, each with its own bet.

resplit.title: Allow for Resplit
description: If the player draws another pair after splitting, they can split again.

doubleDownAfterSplit.title: Allow for Double Down After Split
description: Players can double down on either or both of the hands created by splitting.

surrender.title: Allow for Surrender
description: Players can forfeit half of their original bet and end their round to move on to the next hand.
The dealer must stop drawing cards if they have a hand totaling 17 that includes an Ace counted as 11 (a 'soft' 17).
The dealer must draw another card if they have a hand totaling 17 that includes an Ace counted as 11 (a 'soft' 17).

dealerPeeksForBlackjack.title: Allow Dealer to Peek for Blackjack
description: When the dealer’s upcard is an Ace or a 10-value card, the dealer checks their hole card to see if they have a Blackjack. This rule helps streamline the process and save time.

Note: This setting is disabled by default to make the game feel more 'fair.' Enabling or disabling this option does not affect the game's overall outcome; it is only intended to clarify how the game handles potential Blackjacks and might help avoid confusion for players unfamiliar with how the computer’s RNG works.
